test_code_analysis: The test cases verify the login functionality of the authentication controller, including successful login, invalid credentials, exceptions during authentication, and handling cases with missing or no JSON data.

The tests verify the authentication functionality of the LoginService, covering scenarios like successful authentication, wrong password, account locked, and non-existent user, and ensure appropriate actions are taken based on these conditions.

The tests verify the login functionality of the account lock controller, covering scenarios such as successful login, invalid credentials, and various invalid payloads (missing user ID, missing password, empty payload, and no payload).
The tests verify the login functionality, covering scenarios such as successful login, account lockout, invalid credentials, and missing or invalid input data.

The tests check the authentication functionality of the AuthService, covering scenarios like successful authentication, invalid passwords, nonexistent users, and various edge cases with empty or null usernames and passwords.
